pullRequest.title: Add a section on Cache guide about negative caching and null values.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Document some of the findings, working with the cache.
I wanted to also talk about shutting down the noisy stack-trace (#10804 (comment)) but am not able to get this to work.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            == Negative chaching and nulls
          
          
            
            == Negative caching and nulls
This sentence is confusing, maybe reword a bit?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -484,5 +490,87 @@ public class CachedService {
     }
 }
 ----
-<1> This method can be used to force a refresh of the cache entry corresponding to the given key. 
+<1> This method can be used to force a refresh of the cache entry corresponding to the given key.
 <2> This method will invalidate all entries from the `foo` and `bar` caches with a single call.
+
+[#negative-cache]
+== Negative chaching and nulls
+
+Sometimes one wants to cache the results of an (expensive) remote call.
+With all remote  calls, they may fail, in which case one may not want to store the bad results.

commit.message: Add a section on negative caching and null values.

beforeCommit.message: Fix typo and clarify a bit.

afterCommit.message: Add a section on negative caching and null values.
